name: SPINE ROUTER 01
desc: High Performance L3 Core. Node 1. Configuration includes network version 2 and renderer networkd. It defines ethernet interfaces 'eth_to_leaf3', 'eth_to_leaf4', 'eth_to_leaf5', 'eth_to_edge9'. It defines static routes.

name: SPINE ROUTER 01_ETH_TO_LEAF3
desc: Physical interface 'eth_to_leaf3' on SPINE ROUTER 01. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 10.0.1.1/30.

name: SPINE ROUTER 01_ETH_TO_LEAF4
desc: Physical interface 'eth_to_leaf4' on SPINE ROUTER 01. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 10.0.2.1/30.

name: SPINE ROUTER 01_ETH_TO_LEAF5
desc: Physical interface 'eth_to_leaf5' on SPINE ROUTER 01. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 10.0.3.1/30.

name: SPINE ROUTER 01_ETH_TO_EDGE9
desc: Physical interface 'eth_to_edge9' on SPINE ROUTER 01. Assigned IP address 10.200.1.2/30. Uses 10.200.1.1 as gateway4.

name: SPINE ROUTER 02
desc: Redundant L3 Core. Node 2. Configuration includes network version 2 and renderer networkd. It defines ethernet interfaces 'eth_to_leaf3', 'eth_to_leaf6', 'eth_to_edge10'.

name: SPINE ROUTER 02_ETH_TO_LEAF3
desc: Physical interface 'eth_to_leaf3' on SPINE ROUTER 02. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 10.0.11.1/30.

name: SPINE ROUTER 02_ETH_TO_LEAF6
desc: Physical interface 'eth_to_leaf6' on SPINE ROUTER 02. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 10.0.13.1/30.

name: SPINE ROUTER 02_ETH_TO_EDGE10
desc: Physical interface 'eth_to_edge10' on SPINE ROUTER 02. Assigned IP address 10.200.2.2/30. Uses 10.200.2.1 as gateway4.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 01
desc: ToR cho tủ Server Tính toán. Node 3. Configuration includes network version 2 and renderer networkd. It defines ethernet interfaces 'eth_uplink_spine1', 'eth_uplink_spine2', 'eth_downlink_srv8'. It defines bond interfaces 'bond_tor_compute'. It defines VLAN interfaces 'vlan10_mgmt', 'vlan20_vm'. It defines static routes.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 01_ETH_UPLINK_SPINE1
desc: Physical interface 'eth_uplink_spine1' on COMPUTE LEAF 01. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 10.0.1.2/30.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 01_ETH_UPLINK_SPINE2
desc: Physical interface 'eth_uplink_spine2' on COMPUTE LEAF 01. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 10.0.11.2/30.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 01_ETH_DOWNLINK_SRV8
desc: Physical interface 'eth_downlink_srv8' on COMPUTE LEAF 01. DHCPv4 is disabled. This interface is a member of bond 'bond_tor_compute'.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 01_BOND_TOR_COMPUTE
desc: Bond interface 'bond_tor_compute' on COMPUTE LEAF 01. Aggregates interface 'eth_downlink_srv8'. Configured with mode 802.3ad, lacp rate fast, mii monitor interval 100.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 01_VLAN10_MGMT
desc: VLAN interface 'vlan10_mgmt' on COMPUTE LEAF 01. VLAN ID is 10. Linked to 'bond_tor_compute'. Assigned IP address 192.168.1.253/24.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 01_VLAN20_VM
desc: VLAN interface 'vlan20_vm' on COMPUTE LEAF 01. VLAN ID is 20. Linked to 'bond_tor_compute'. Assigned IP address 172.16.20.253/24.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 02
desc: ToR Dự phòng cho tủ Compute. Node 4. Configuration includes network version 2 and renderer networkd. It defines ethernet interfaces 'eth_uplink_spine1', 'eth_downlink_srv8'. It defines bond interfaces 'bond_tor_compute'. It defines VLAN interfaces 'vlan20_vm'.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 02_ETH_UPLINK_SPINE1
desc: Physical interface 'eth_uplink_spine1' on COMPUTE LEAF 02. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 10.0.2.2/30.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 02_ETH_DOWNLINK_SRV8
desc: Physical interface 'eth_downlink_srv8' on COMPUTE LEAF 02. DHCPv4 is disabled. This interface is a member of bond 'bond_tor_compute'.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 02_BOND_TOR_COMPUTE
desc: Bond interface 'bond_tor_compute' on COMPUTE LEAF 02. Aggregates interface 'eth_downlink_srv8'. Configured with mode 802.3ad.

name: COMPUTE LEAF 02_VLAN20_VM
desc: VLAN interface 'vlan20_vm' on COMPUTE LEAF 02. VLAN ID is 20. Linked to 'bond_tor_compute'. Assigned IP address 172.16.20.254/24.

name: STORAGE LEAF 01
desc: ToR cho tủ Storage - Tối ưu Jumbo Frame. Node 5. Configuration includes network version 2 and renderer networkd. It defines ethernet interfaces 'eth_uplink_spine1', 'eth_downlink_srv7'. It defines bond interfaces 'bond_tor_storage'. It defines VLAN interfaces 'vlan30_san'.

name: STORAGE LEAF 01_ETH_UPLINK_SPINE1
desc: Physical interface 'eth_uplink_spine1' on STORAGE LEAF 01. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 10.0.3.2/30.

name: STORAGE LEAF 01_ETH_DOWNLINK_SRV7
desc: Physical interface 'eth_downlink_srv7' on STORAGE LEAF 01. Configured with MTU 9000. DHCPv4 is disabled. This interface is a member of bond 'bond_tor_storage'.

name: STORAGE LEAF 01_BOND_TOR_STORAGE
desc: Bond interface 'bond_tor_storage' on STORAGE LEAF 01. Aggregates interface 'eth_downlink_srv7'. Configured with MTU 9000. Configured with mode 802.3ad.

name: STORAGE LEAF 01_VLAN30_SAN
desc: VLAN interface 'vlan30_san' on STORAGE LEAF 01. VLAN ID is 30. Linked to 'bond_tor_storage'. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 172.16.30.253/24.

name: STORAGE LEAF 02
desc: ToR Dự phòng cho tủ Storage. Node 6. Configuration includes network version 2 and renderer networkd. It defines ethernet interfaces 'eth_uplink_spine2', 'eth_downlink_srv7'. It defines bond interfaces 'bond_tor_storage'. It defines VLAN interfaces 'vlan30_san'.

name: STORAGE LEAF 02_ETH_UPLINK_SPINE2
desc: Physical interface 'eth_uplink_spine2' on STORAGE LEAF 02. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 10.0.13.2/30.

name: STORAGE LEAF 02_ETH_DOWNLINK_SRV7
desc: Physical interface 'eth_downlink_srv7' on STORAGE LEAF 02. Configured with MTU 9000. DHCPv4 is disabled. This interface is a member of bond 'bond_tor_storage'.

name: STORAGE LEAF 02_BOND_TOR_STORAGE
desc: Bond interface 'bond_tor_storage' on STORAGE LEAF 02. Aggregates interface 'eth_downlink_srv7'. Configured with MTU 9000. Configured with mode 802.3ad.

name: STORAGE LEAF 02_VLAN30_SAN
desc: VLAN interface 'vlan30_san' on STORAGE LEAF 02. VLAN ID is 30. Linked to 'bond_tor_storage'. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 172.16.30.254/24.

name: HIGH-PERFORMANCE STORAGE SERVER
desc: NAS/SAN Target. Node 7. Configuration includes network version 2 and renderer networkd. It defines ethernet interfaces 'eno1', 'eno2'. It defines bond interfaces 'bond0_storage'. It defines VLAN interfaces 'bond0.30'.

name: HIGH-PERFORMANCE STORAGE SERVER_ENO1
desc: Physical interface 'eno1' on HIGH-PERFORMANCE STORAGE SERVER. Configured with MTU 9000. DHCPv4 is disabled. This interface is a member of bond 'bond0_storage'.

name: HIGH-PERFORMANCE STORAGE SERVER_ENO2
desc: Physical interface 'eno2' on HIGH-PERFORMANCE STORAGE SERVER. Configured with MTU 9000. DHCPv4 is disabled. This interface is a member of bond 'bond0_storage'.

name: HIGH-PERFORMANCE STORAGE SERVER_BOND0_STORAGE
desc: Bond interface 'bond0_storage' on HIGH-PERFORMANCE STORAGE SERVER. Aggregates interfaces 'eno1' and 'eno2'. Configured with MTU 9000. Configured with mode 802.3ad, transmit hash policy layer3+4.

name: HIGH-PERFORMANCE STORAGE SERVER_BOND0.30
desc: VLAN interface 'bond0.30' on HIGH-PERFORMANCE STORAGE SERVER. VLAN ID is 30. Linked to 'bond0_storage'. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP address 172.16.30.10/24. Includes static route for 172.16.30.0/24 via 172.16.30.253.

name: COMPUTE HYPERVISOR
desc: Chạy máy ảo/Container. Node 8. Configuration includes network version 2 and renderer networkd. It defines ethernet interfaces 'eth0', 'eth1'. It defines bond interfaces 'bond0_compute'. It defines VLAN interfaces 'bond0.10', 'bond0.20'. It defines bridge interfaces 'br_vm_data'.

name: COMPUTE HYPERVISOR_ETH0
desc: Physical interface 'eth0' on COMPUTE HYPERVISOR. DHCPv4 is disabled. This interface is a member of bond 'bond0_compute'.

name: COMPUTE HYPERVISOR_ETH1
desc: Physical interface 'eth1' on COMPUTE HYPERVISOR. DHCPv4 is disabled. This interface is a member of bond 'bond0_compute'.

name: COMPUTE HYPERVISOR_BOND0_COMPUTE
desc: Bond interface 'bond0_compute' on COMPUTE HYPERVISOR. Aggregates interfaces 'eth0' and 'eth1'. Configured with mode 802.3ad.

name: COMPUTE HYPERVISOR_BOND0.10
desc: VLAN interface 'bond0.10' on COMPUTE HYPERVISOR. VLAN ID is 10. Linked to 'bond0_compute'. Assigned IP address 192.168.1.100/24. Uses 192.168.1.253 as gateway4.

name: COMPUTE HYPERVISOR_BOND0.20
desc: VLAN interface 'bond0.20' on COMPUTE HYPERVISOR. VLAN ID is 20. Linked to 'bond0_compute'. This interface is a member of bridge 'br_vm_data'.

name: COMPUTE HYPERVISOR_BR_VM_DATA
desc: Bridge interface 'br_vm_data' on COMPUTE HYPERVISOR. Includes interface 'bond0.20'. Configured with stp disabled, forward delay 0.

name: EDGE ROUTER 01
desc: Primary WAN Gateway. Node 9. Configuration includes network version 2 and renderer networkd. It defines ethernet interfaces 'wan0_internet', 'lan0_to_spine1'. It defines static routes.

name: EDGE ROUTER 01_WAN0_INTERNET
desc: Physical interface 'wan0_internet' on EDGE ROUTER 01. Assigned IP address 203.0.113.10/24. Uses 203.0.113.1 as gateway4.

name: EDGE ROUTER 01_LAN0_TO_SPINE1
desc: Physical interface 'lan0_to_spine1' on EDGE ROUTER 01. Assigned IP address 10.200.1.1/30.

name: EDGE ROUTER 02
desc: Secondary WAN Gateway. Node 10. Configuration includes network version 2 and renderer networkd. It defines ethernet interfaces 'wan0_internet', 'lan0_to_spine2'. It defines static routes.

name: EDGE ROUTER 02_WAN0_INTERNET
desc: Physical interface 'wan0_internet' on EDGE ROUTER 02. Assigned IP address 203.0.113.11/24. Uses 203.0.113.1 as gateway4.

name: EDGE ROUTER 02_LAN0_TO_SPINE2
desc: Physical interface 'lan0_to_spine2' on EDGE ROUTER 02. Assigned IP address 10.200.2.1/30.
